deriveY(uint8,uint256,uint256,uint256,ui.details: Derives the y coordinate from a compressed-format point x.

ecAdd(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,ui.details: Add two points (x1, y1) and (x2, y2) in affine coordinates.

ecMul(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,ui.details: Multiply point (x1, y1, z1) times d in affine coordinates.

ecSub(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,ui.details: Substract two points (x1, y1) and (x2, y2) in affine coordinates.

invMod(uint256,uint256).details: Modular euclidean inverse of a number (mod p).

isOnCurve(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint25.details: Check whether point (x,y) is on curve defined by a, b, and _pp.
isOnCurve(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint25.return: true if x,y in the curve, false else

toAffine(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256.details: Converts a point (x, y, z) expressed in Jacobian coordinates to affine coordinates (x', y', 1).
